full_summary:
**Maintenance Services for Fleet of Powered Lift Trucks**
==============================================

**Request for Proposal (RFP)**
-----------------------------

**Notice**

Statistics Canada has a requirement to obtain maintenance services for its fleet of powered lift trucks. The requirement is subject to the provisions of the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP), the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Trade Agreements**
-----------------

The RFP is applicable to the trade agreements listed below:

* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Scope of Work**
-----------------

The Contractor is required to provide on-site scheduled maintenance services and "as and when requested" services for the fleet of powered lift trucks.

**Contract Period**
-----------------

The contract will be awarded for a period of approximately November 2024 to March 31, 2026.

**Option to Extend**
-------------------

The Contractor grants to Canada the irrevocable option to extend the term of the Contract by up to three (3) additional one (1) year periods under the same conditions.

**Security Requirements**
-------------------------

The Contractor must meet the security requirements outlined in the contract specifications.

**Contact Information**
------------------------

Contact Person: Abbas Khokhar
Email: abbas.khokhar@statcan.gc.ca
Phone: 343-548-1422

**Debriefing**
--------------

Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process within 15 working days from receipt of the results of the bid solicitation process.

**Submission and Closing Date**
------------------------------

The deadline for submissions of bids in response to this RFP is June 07, 2024, at 14:00 HST. Any bids received after this date and time will be returned unopened to the Bidder.

**Documentation**
----------------

Refer to the Solicitation Document and attached files for further details. The Solicitation Document and attached files can be accessed via the following link: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/36781/english-request-for-proposal.pdf

==============================================
